org.perfcake.reporting.reporter

Class AbstractReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.perfcake.reporting.reporter.AbstractReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reporter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassifyingReporter, GeolocationReporter, IterationsPerSecondReporter, MemoryUsageReporter, RawReporter, ResponseTimeHistogramReporter, StatsReporter, WarmUpReporter

    public abstract class AbstractReporter
extends Object
implements Reporter
    Represents a basic reporter that makes sure that the contract defined as part of Reporter is held. The class is also well tested.
    Author:
    Martin Večeřa

    • Method Detail

      • report

        public final void report(MeasurementUnit measurementUnit)
                  throws ReportingException
        Reports a single MeasurementUnit to this reporter. This calls doReport(MeasurementUnit) overridden by a child, accumulates results and reports iteration change and percentage change (if any).
        Specified by:
        report in interface Reporter
        Parameters:
        measurementUnit - Measurement Unit from a run iteration
        Throws:
        ReportingException - When it was not possible to report the MeasurementUnit.

      • newMeasurement

        public Measurement newMeasurement()
        Gets a new measurement pre-filled with values from current run info.
        Returns:
        The new measurement with current values from run info.

      • setReportManager

        Description copied from interface: Reporter
        Sets Report Manager for the report to be able to control and monitor the current status of reporting.
        Specified by:
        setReportManager in interface Reporter
        Parameters:
        reportManager - ReportManager that owns this Reporter.

      • registerDestination

        public final void registerDestination(Destination destination,
                                      Period period)
        Description copied from interface: Reporter
        Registers a destination to receive resulting Measurements in a given period.
        Specified by:
        registerDestination in interface Reporter
        Parameters:
        destination - The Destination to which the results should be published
        period - The period interval in which the destination should publish results

      • registerDestination

        public final void registerDestination(Destination destination,
                                      Set<Period> periods)
        Description copied from interface: Reporter
        Registers a destination to receive resulting Measurements in given periods. It is the goal of Reporter to make sure the results are published to the registered destinations. For an easier development it is advised to extend AbstractReporter which already takes care of this. A destination cannot be registered with the same period type multiple times (i.e. one cannot register a destination with a period of iteration type that reports every 10 iterations, and with a period of iteration type that reports every 100 iterations at the same time).
        Specified by:
        registerDestination in interface Reporter
        Parameters:
        destination - The Destination to which the results should be published.
        periods - The set of period intervals in which the destination should publish results.

      • unregisterDestination

        public final void unregisterDestination(Destination destination)
        Description copied from interface: Reporter
        Removes a previously registered Destination. The method removes all occurrences of the destination should it be registered with multiple periods. A Reporter should close the Destination if it is still open.
        Specified by:
        unregisterDestination in interface Reporter
        Parameters:
        destination - The Destination to be unregistered (and stopped)

      • reset

        public final void reset()
        Description copied from interface: Reporter
        Resets the reporter statistics to the initial state. This is mainly used for clean up after a warm-up period.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface Reporter

      • getDestinations

        public final Set<Destination> getDestinations()
        Description copied from interface: Reporter
        Gets an unmodifiable set of all registered destinations.
        Specified by:
        getDestinations in interface Reporter
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable set of all currently registered destinations.

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: Reporter
        Starts the reporter. After a call to this method, reporter will report measurement results to the registered destinations. All destinations are started as well.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Reporter

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: Reporter
        Stops the reporter. After a call to this method, no more results will be reported to the destinatons. All destinations are stopped as well.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Reporter

      • setRunInfo

        public final void setRunInfo(RunInfo runInfo)
        Description copied from interface: Reporter
        Sets Run Info for the current measurement run. This must be set prior to starting the reporter. Failed to do so can lead to an assertion error.
        Specified by:
        setRunInfo in interface Reporter
        Parameters:
        runInfo - RunInfo for the current measurement run.

      • getReportingPeriods

        public final Set<BoundPeriod<Destination>> getReportingPeriods()
        Description copied from interface: Reporter
        Gets an unmodifiable set of registered reporting periods.
        Specified by:
        getReportingPeriods in interface Reporter
        Returns:
        The unmodifiable set of registered reporting periods.
